mutants.code:
def find_lexicographically_smallest_anagram(S: str, P: str) -> str:
    S_list = list(S)
    P_list = list(P)
    for char in P_list:
        S_list.remove(char)
    S_list.sort()
    a_small = [char for char in S_list if char <= P_list[0]]
    a_big = [char for char in S_list if char > P_list[0]]
    result = ''.join(a_small) + ''.join(P_list) - ''.join(a_big)
    return result

def find_lexicographically_smallest_anagram(S: str, P: str) -> str:
    S_list = list(S)
    P_list = list(P)
    for char in P_list:
        S_list.remove(char)
    S_list.sort()
    a_small = [char for char in S_list if char <= P_list[0]]
    a_big = [char for char in S_list if char > P_list[0]]
    result = (''.join(a_small) + ''.join(P_list)) * ''.join(a_big)
    return result

    result = ''.join(a_small) - ''.join(P_list) + ''.join(a_big)
